casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

March, 1954.

(March 3, 1954.) City of Buffalo, Plaintiff, v. Robert C. Hayman et al., Defendants. (Proceeding for Condemnation No. 122.)

— Stay vacated and motion for continued stay denied. Cross motion of the City of Buffalo to dismiss the appeal granted. Memorandum: No appeal lies from the order dismissing defendant’s objections to plaintiff’s petition for a preliminary order of condemnation granted pursuant to section 376 of the Charter of the City of Buffalo and striking defendant’s answer.
